settings.name: Enable Youtube Proxy
settings.description: Will make the source request the youtube proxy server to get additional metadata from youtube
settings.warningDialog:
This increases loading times significantly.

Try disabling if you have issues when loading videos.

settings.name: Youtube Proxy Server
settings.description: Which Youtube Proxy Server to use

settings.name: Merge PSDE and YT metrics (requires YTProxy)
settings.description: Will merge the metrics from pietsmiet.de and youtube.com (views, likes, dislikes, etc) when available through PSProxy
